mkr.ant.taskdefs
Class XSLTProcess

java.lang.Object
  org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntRef<T>
      org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntTask<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.XSLTProcess>
          mkr.ant.taskdefs.XSLTProcess

public class XSLTProcess
extends AntTask<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.XSLTProcess>

Processes a set of XML documents via XSLT. This is useful for building views of XML based documentation.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.XSLTProcess)

setReloadStylesheet

public XSLTProcess setReloadStylesheet(boolean val)
Controls whether the stylesheet is reloaded for every transform.

Setting this to true may get around a bug in certain Xalan-J versions, default is false.

public XSLTProcess setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper(org.apache.tools.ant.RuntimeConfigurable val)
Sets the wrapper to be used for runtime configuration. This method should be used only by the ProjectHelper and Ant internals. It is public to allow helper plugins to operate on tasks, normal tasks should never use it.
